short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display weather in a smart and beautiful way. See the current weather condition and a 5 day forecast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Weather Tab shows you current weather data where it belongs: in your tab window.
A simple and intuitive user interface does not distract you and shows you only the most important information at a glance.

Smart Weather Tab can either automatically pinpoint your location or you can select any city in the world to get the latest weather data.


Top Features
ðŸŒ€ Up-to-date weather report with daily highlights
ðŸŒ€ 5-day weather forecast with detailed highlights for each day
ðŸŒ€ Changing background images for every weather condition
ðŸŒ€ Make it yours! Customize the displayed unit settings or activate dark mode


Privacy
Smart Weather Tab does not collect any user data. Essential non-personalized data related to the core functionality of the application is stored in your local chrome cache. Learn more in the privacy policy section.


Performance
Compared to other weather applications, Smart Weather Tab is blazing-fast and focuses on performance. No bloated 3rd party libs are included and fetched weather data is cached in the browser to save bandwidth.

Responsive
Smart Weather Tab is fully responsive and works on all screen-, and device sizes.

Enjoy!
